verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_1: I call to swear by the Day of Resurrection.
verse.verse_2: And I do swear by the self- blaming soul.
verse.verse_3: Does man think that We shall not assemble his bones?
verse.verse_4: Why not, We are Powerful to restore his very fingertips.
verse.verse_5: But man desires to do wrong infront of him.
verse.verse_6: He asks, when will be the Day of Resurrection.
verse.verse_7: But when the eyes is dazzled.
verse.verse_9: And the sun and the moon will be joined together.
verse.verse_10: On that day the man will say, where is place to run away do?
verse.verse_12: On that day one is to take towards your Lord alone.
verse.verse_13: That day man shall be informed as to what he has sent forward and what he left behind.
verse.verse_14: But rather man has complete sight over his own condition.
verse.verse_15: And if he brings all excuses he hasm, even then he will not be heard.
verse.verse_16: Move not your tongue with Quran that you may hasten to learn it.
verse.verse_17: Undoubtedly, it is upon Us to preserve it and to recite.
verse.verse_18: So when We have already recited it follow then its recital.
verse.verse_19: Then it is upon Us, to make clear its minute details.
verse.verse_20: Nothing, rather you O infidels! Love near life.
verse.verse_21: And you have already neglected the Hereafter.
verse.verse_22: Some faces on that day will be fresh.
verse.verse_24: And some faces that day will be sad and dismal.
verse.verse_25: Thinking that back-breaking calamity will befall them.
verse.verse_26: Yes, when it will reach to the throat.
verse.verse_27: And it will be said, is there anyone who may exorcise?
verse.verse_28: And he (the dying man) will think that it is the hour of parting.
verse.verse_29: And shank will intertwined with shank.
verse.verse_30: The drive that day is towards your Lord.
verse.verse_31: For neither he accepted the truth nor offered prayers.
verse.verse_32: Yes, he belied and turned his face.
verse.verse_33: Then he departed to his home arrogantly.
verse.verse_34: Woe is near to you, now woe is near.
verse.verse_35: Again woe is near to you, now woe is near.
verse.verse_36: Does man think that he will be left free?
verse.verse_37: Was he not a sperm of emission emitted?
verse.verse_38: Then he became a clot, then He created him and perfected him.
verse.verse_39: And then He made of him a pair, the male and female.
verse.verse_40: Would the One Who has done all these things be not able to give life to the dead?
